fields.title: Anyone But You
fields.description: A romantic comedy about two strangers who pretend to be a couple at a wedding, leading to unexpected romance and hilarious situations.

fields.title: Bells
fields.description: A psychological thriller about a small town haunted by mysterious bell sounds that drive residents to madness.

fields.title: Everest
fields.description: Based on true events, this gripping adventure follows climbers facing a deadly storm on Mount Everest in 1996.

fields.title: Forever My Girl
fields.description: A country music star returns to his hometown and reconnects with his high school sweetheart and the daughter he never knew he had.

fields.title: Gran Turismo
fields.description: Based on the true story of a young gamer who uses his video game skills to become a professional race car driver.

fields.title: How To Train Your Dragon
fields.description: A young Viking befriends a dragon and learns that everything he thought he knew about dragons was wrong.

fields.title: Imaginary
fields.description: A horror film about a young girl whose imaginary friend turns out to be something far more sinister than anyone could imagine.

fields.title: Joker
fields.description: A gritty character study of Arthur Fleck, a man disregarded by society who descends into madness and becomes the iconic villain.

fields.title: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
fields.description: Sean Anderson partners with his mom's boyfriend to find his grandfather on a mythical island.

fields.title: Nobody
fields.description: A mild-mannered family man reveals his deadly skills when his family is threatened by a ruthless crime boss.

fields.title: Redeeming Love
fields.description: A romantic drama based on the bestselling novel, set in 1850s California during the Gold Rush.

fields.title: San Andreas
fields.description: A rescue pilot must navigate a devastating earthquake across California to save his estranged daughter.

fields.title: Scoob!
fields.description: Scooby-Doo and the gang face their most challenging mystery yet when they discover Scooby's secret legacy.

fields.title: Shooter
fields.description: A former Marine sniper is framed for an assassination attempt and must clear his name while being hunted.

fields.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
fields.description: Smurfette and her friends embark on a thrilling adventure through the Forbidden Forest to find a mysterious lost village.

fields.title: Tarot
fields.description: A group of college friends accidentally unleash ancient evil entities after using a cursed tarot deck.

fields.title: The 33
fields.description: Based on true events, the story of 33 Chilean miners trapped underground for 69 days and their miraculous rescue.

fields.title: The Choice
fields.description: A romantic drama about a man whose life is forever changed by his relationship with his neighbor.

fields.title: The Christmas Chronicles
fields.description: Two siblings team up with Santa Claus to save Christmas after accidentally causing his sleigh to crash.

fields.title: The Shawshank Redemption
fields.description: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

fields.title: The Magnificent Seven
fields.description: Seven gunmen from a variety of backgrounds are brought together to defend a poor village from savage thieves.

fields.title: Uncharted
fields.description: A heartwarming story about unexpected friendships formed over shared meals and life's simple pleasures.
